document.full_text: tyler hamilton, who was allowed to keep his athens olympics gold medal despite failing a doping test, has finally confessed to cheating and accused other top cyclists including lance armstrong of doing the same.
document.title: hamilton implicates armstrong, admits to doping
lines_and_colors: tyler hamilton, who was allowed to keep his athens olympics gold medal despite failing a doping test, has finally confessed to cheating and accused other top cyclists including lance armstrong of doing the same.
